pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhārentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṃ dhāressanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.2: Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ na phāsu hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.6: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.8: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṃ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṃ, kilañjacchattaṃ, paṇṇacchattaṃ maṇḍalabaddhaṃ salākabaddhaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.1: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.2: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.3: Agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.4: Chattaṃ dhāreti na upāhanaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.5: Upāhanaṃ dhāreti na chattaṃ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
